properties.name: openai.api.key
properties.description: Api key to use GPT models through OpenAI's api.

properties.name: azure.vision.api.key
properties.description: Api key to use Cognitive Vision image analysis capabilities from Microsoft Azure's cognitive vision api.

properties.name: azure.vision.api.endpoint
properties.description: Endpoint to send api request to for utilising Microsoft Azure's cognitive vision api.

properties.name: file.upload-dir
properties.description: Directory path within the project where all multi-part form files will be stored.
